OOC: I think it's a fine idea about the team thing. As for the character th=
ing, I can compromise to any character limits, so it doesn't matter to me. =
I think perhaps 15 is a good rounded off number, though...

  ----- Origina=
l Message -----
  From: robertdahl
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Sat=
urday, November 03, 2001 11:44 PM
  Subject: Re: Hahaha thish is cool


  H=
ey Soulstice, how ya doin? I havent heard much from you lately, you
  okay?=
 Also don't worry, i believe you didnt write those things (damn
  frustrati=
ng though). Anyways the council is trying to decide a character
  limit, be=
cause in the past, people have constantly brought in new
  characters, carr=
ying to many, and then forgetting about the older ones.
  We want to know w=
hat in your opinion would be a good number limit.

  Somebody suggested 15,=
 and no limit to the number in a faction. What is
  your thought?

  We als=
o think that to be a faction, someone needs to have a least three
  differe=
nt people in the group. What do you think about this?
